Package mvc.dao

Class EmpleadoDAO

java.lang.Object
mvc.dao.EmpleadoDAO
public class EmpleadoDAO extends Object
This class represents a Data Access Object (DAO) for handling employee data. It provides methods to retrieve, search, and manipulate employee information in the database.

    • obtenerEmpleados

      public List<Empleado> obtenerEmpleados() throws SQLException
      Retrieves a list of all employees from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of Employee objects.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an error with the database.

    • obtenerEmpleadoPorDni

      public Empleado obtenerEmpleadoPorDni(String dni) throws Exception
      Retrieves an employee's information by their DNI (Identification Number).
      Parameters:
      dni - The DNI of the employee to retrieve.
      Returns:
      An Employee object with the employee's information.
      Throws:
      Exception - If there is an error with the database or no employee is found with the given DNI.

    • obtenerSalario

      public double obtenerSalario(String dni) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the salary of an employee with the given DNI (Identification Number).
      Parameters:
      dni - The DNI of the employee for whom you want to obtain the salary.
      Returns:
      The salary of the employee.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an error with the database or no salary is found for the given DNI.

    • buscarChoiceDni

      public List<Empleado> buscarChoiceDni(String dni) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a list of employees based on their DNI (Identification Number) matching a given value.
      Parameters:
      dni - The DNI value to search for in the employees' records.
      Returns:
      A list of Employee objects matching the DNI value.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an error with the database.

      public List<Empleado> buscarChoiceNombre(String nombre) throws SQLException

      Parameters:
      nombre - The name value to search for in the employees' records.
      Returns:
      A list of Employee objects matching the name value.

      SQLException - If there is an error with the database.
